creator: belial
description:
{RHelp Topic{W: Myst{x

Myst is the Goddess of Mischief. She is a trickster and loves intrigue. She
like to toy with people's minds, mortal and immortal alike. It is said that
she is a creation of Sirian's to spread more chaos in the world, though that
doesn't seem likely. She is very mysterious and is sure to have a hand in
any number of plots and schemes. Her favorite pasttime seems to be annoying
Caerdik in one way or another. Even being mysterious as she is, she is also
very flamboyant and flirtatious. Spies, thieves, and even politicians seem
to make up the majority of myst's followers. Her worshippers specialize in
stealth and misdirection.
